subScenes.name: 开场致意
subScenes.description: 乘客礼貌联系客服说明来电目的

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, this is Lisa Chen calling about my flight.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您好，我是Lisa Chen，想咨询我的航班。

responses.text: Hi, I'm calling to reschedule my flight due to an emergency.
responses.text_cn: 我打电话是想改签航班，因为有急事。

responses.text: Hey, can you help me change my flight? Something came up.
responses.text_cn: 能帮我改个航班吗？出事了。

responses.text: Lisa Chen, need to change flight.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简洁理由开场，避免冗长

subScenes.name: 说明原因
subScenes.description: 乘客清晰说明改签的紧急原因

qaPairs.speakerText: I need to change my flight because my mom had a sudden accident.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我得改签，我妈妈突然出事故了。

responses.text: My mother was rushed to the hospital — I really need to get there ASAP.
responses.text_cn: 我妈妈被紧急送医，我必须尽快赶到。

responses.text: Family emergency, gotta change it — can you help?
responses.text_cn: 家里出急事，能帮我改吗？

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体事件增强说服力，避免模糊

subScenes.name: 查询空位
subScenes.description: 客服询问可选日期，乘客提出偏好

qaPairs.speakerText: We have openings on the 15th at 10 a.m. or the 16th at 3 p.m.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 15号上午10点或16号下午3点有空位。

responses.text: Can I get the 15th at 10? I need to be there before noon.
responses.text_cn: 能选15号10点吗？我中午前必须到。

responses.text: 15th works, but is there anything earlier?

qaPairs.usageNote: 优先表达明确偏好，再询问替代方案

subScenes.name: 确认费用
subScenes.description: 客服告知改签费用，乘客确认支付方式

qaPairs.speakerText: There's a $75 change fee, but no fare difference.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 改签费75美元，票价没差价。

responses.text: Okay, I'll pay with my card ending in 4421.
responses.text_cn: 好的，我用尾号4421的卡支付。

responses.text: 75 bucks? Ugh. Can I use PayPal instead?

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确支付方式，避免后续误会

qaPairs.speakerText: The fee will be charged to your card on file.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 费用将从您登记的卡片扣款。

responses.text: Yes, that’s fine — just make sure it’s processed.
responses.text_cn: 可以，但请确保处理成功。

qaPairs.usageNote: 确认扣款成功，避免纠纷

subScenes.name: 道别确认
subScenes.description: 客服确认改签成功，乘客致谢并结束通话

qaPairs.speakerText: Your new flight is confirmed for the 15th at 10 a.m. You'll get an email shortly.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 您的新航班已确认，15号上午10点，稍后会发邮件。

responses.text: Thank you so much — you’ve saved me!

qaPairs.usageNote: 用简短感谢收尾，保持礼貌高效
